__e: If it's a choice I have to make between a chicken thief and ridding the world of a few uniforms, I'll not be choosing the chicken thief!
You keep comin' up with this lame country dream, life in the country, vegetables and chickens and stuff. I hate all that stuff.
And I got the chickens and the truck!
An old goof who said he was the real Jesse James... until they found out he was a chicken thief from Gallup... by the name of, uh, Schimmelmacher.
[She knew precisely...] [... where Don Camillo's hens had ended up.]
- And what about Katie... and Grandpa and the chickens?
He who knows how to steal only chickens doesn't have the right to eat!
